ygData.subject: Re: your EQ webpage
ygData.msgSnippet: Please keep me informed as to updates on your excellent resource. I really appreciate it. And, if I may be so bold... don t let the few people who complain
ygData.messageBody:
Please keep me informed as to updates on your excellent resource. I really
appreciate it.

And, if I may be so bold... don't let the few people who complain about OT
posts stop you from putting the word out. For DAMN sure their posts
complaining are far more inappropriate than an update notice is...

People like this are just jealous, or have a grudge against "spoiler" sites,
or were beaten at tetherball matches in grade school a lot, whatever. At any
rate, in the final analysis, you are helping far more people than you are
harming by p1mping your site.

On the Internet, complaints = flattery. Strange but true.

Welcome to the world of WebMastery! It's a hoot, ain't it?


(PS: I cc'ed this to the EQ_Smiths page just to see if somebody might start
frothing at the mouth. That always brightens up a mailing list. :)
